description: Some of the most innovative companies are launching new timeline apps this week at SXSW in Austin, Texas. New apps give people more ways to add their location, fitness, video and media interests to their timeline and share what they love with friends.

title: Introducing Interest Lists
description: Lists on Facebook are a great way to organize your friends and focus on the people who matter most. Starting today, you also have interest lists—a whole new way to keep up with stuff you care about and tidy up your experience on Facebook.
